title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 157.2 - Rights of party denied access to records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 157.2 - Rights of party denied access to records

State Regulations

If access to a record is denied, such denial may be
appealed to the Canal Corporation executive director, or his or her
designee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
157.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
